comment: Smart Data Models - Energy / Three Phase AC Measurement adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.Energy/master/ThreePhaseAcMeasurement/schema.json
description: An electrical  measurement from a system that uses three phase alternating current.

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateEnergyMeteringStarted
contents.comment: The starting date for metering energy.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: frequency
contents.comment: The frequency of the circuit.

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: totalActiveEnergyExport
contents.comment: Total energy exported since metering started (since `dateEnergyMeteringStarted`).

contents.name: totalActiveEnergyImport
contents.comment: Total energy imported i.e. consumed since metering started (since `dateEnergyMeteringStarted`).

contents.name: totalActivePower
contents.comment: Active power consumed (counting all phases)

contents.name: totalApparentEnergyExport
contents.comment: Total energy exported (with regards to apparent power) since the metering start date (`dateEnergyMeteringStarted`)

contents.name: totalApparentEnergyImport
contents.comment: Total energy imported i.e. consumed (with regards to apparent power) since the metering start date (`dateEnergyMeteringStarted`)

contents.name: totalApparentPower
contents.comment: Apparent power consumed (counting all phases).

contents.name: totalDisplacementPowerFactor
contents.comment: Displacement power factor including all phases. The quantity is based on the fundamental frequency of the system

contents.name: totalPowerFactor
contents.comment: Power factor including all phases

contents.name: totalReactiveEnergyExport
contents.comment: Total fundamental frequency reactive energy exported since metering started (since `dateEnergyMeteringStarted`).

contents.name: totalReactiveEnergyImport
contents.comment: Total energy imported i.e. consumed (with regards to fundamental frequency reactive power) since the metering start date (`dateEnergyMeteringStarted`)

contents.name: totalReactivePower
contents.comment: Reactive power consumed (counting all phases)

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: refDevice
contents.comment: Device(s) used to obtain the measurement.

contents.name: refTargetDevice
contents.comment: Device(s) for which the measurement was taken.

contents.name: activeEnergyExport
contents.comment: Active energy exported per phase since the metering start date. The actual values will be conveyed by subproperties which names will be equal to the name of each of the alternating current phases: L1, L2, L3.

contents.name: activeEnergyImport
contents.comment: Active energy imported i.e. consumed per phase since the metering start date. The actual values will be conveyed by subproperties which names will be equal to the name of each of the alternating current phases: L1, L2, L3.

contents.name: activePower
contents.comment: The actual values will beconveyed by subproperties which names will be equal to the name of each of the alternating current phases: L1, L2, L3.

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address

contents.name: apparentEnergyExport
contents.comment: Apparent energy exported per phase since the metering start date. The actual values will be conveyed by subproperties which names will be equal to the name of each of the alternating current phases: L1, L2, L3.

contents.name: apparentEnergyImport
contents.comment: Apparent energy imported i.e. consumed per phase since the metering start date. The actual values will be conveyed by subproperties which names will be equal to the name of each of the alternating current phases: L1, L2, L3.

contents.name: apparentPower
contents.comment: Apparent power consumed per phase. The actual values will be conveyed by subproperties which names will be equal to the name of each of the alternating current phases: L1, L2, L3

contents.name: current
contents.comment: Electrical current. The actual values will be conveyed by one subproperty per alternating current phase and the neutral wire: L1, L2, L3 and N.

contents.name: displacementPowerFactor
contents.comment: Displacement power factor for each phase. The quantity is based on the fundamental frequency of the system. The actual values will be conveyed by one subproperty per alternating current phase: L1, L2 and L3

contents.name: phaseToPhaseVoltage
contents.comment: Voltage between phases. A value for each phase pair: phases 1 and 2 (L12), phases 2 and 3 (L32), phases 3 and 1 (L31).

contents.name: phaseVoltage
contents.comment: The voltage between each phase and neutral conductor. The actual values will be conveyed by one subproperty per alternating current phase: L1, L2 and L3

contents.name: powerFactor
contents.comment: Power factor for each phase. The actual values will be conveyed by one subproperty per alternating current phase: L1, L2 and L3

contents.name: reactiveEnergyExport
contents.comment: Fundamental frequency reactive energy exported per phase since the metering start date. The actual values will be conveyed by subproperties which names will be equal to the name of each of the alternating current phases: L1, L2, L3.

contents.name: reactiveEnergyImport
contents.comment: Fundamental frequency reactive energy imported i.e. consumed per phase since the metering start date. The actual values will be conveyed by subproperties which names will be equal to the name of each of the alternating current phases: L1, L2, L3.

contents.name: reactivePower
contents.comment: Fundamental frequency reactive power. The actual values will be conveyed by subproperties whose names will be equal to the name of each of the alternating current phases: L1, L2, L3.

contents.name: thdCurrent
contents.comment: Total harmonic distortion of electrical current. The actual values will be conveyed by one subproperty per alternating current phase: L1, L2 and L3

contents.name: thdVoltage
contents.comment: Total harmonic distortion of voltage for each phase. The actual values will be conveyed by one subproperty per alternating current phase: L1, L2 and L3
